definition: horizontal/across/crosswise/horizontal stroke (in Chinese characters)/to place (sth) flat (on a surface)/to cross (a river, etc)/in a jumble/chaotic/(in fixed expressions) harsh and unreasonable/violent

sentences.english: The designs of the wasp spiders woven tapestry is zigzag.
sentences.chinese: 横纹金蛛织出的网纹是Z字型的。

sentences.english: It reviewed the progress on etiopathogenisis of non-traumatic rhabdomyolysis (NRML) patients and their nursing.
sentences.chinese: 综述了非创伤性横纹肌溶解症的病因及护理进展。

sentences.english: The mechanism of heat transfer enhancement of transversely corrugated tube was discussed.
sentences.chinese: 文内还讨论分析了横纹管的传热强化机理。

sentences.english: Fig . 9 Myocardium cell of Procambarus clark ii . Showing striation of myofibril.
sentences.chinese: 图9螯虾心肌细胞示肌原纤维的横纹。

sentences.english: Fenarol has proved to be effective as a striated muscle relaxant.
sentences.chinese: 已证明芬那露为一种有效的横纹肌松施药。

sentences.english: Its delicate salmon-pink hue blends harmoniously with its soft horizontal grain movement.
sentences.chinese: 其精致的橘红色的色调和谐地融合软横纹运动。

sentences.english: Transverse strength was significantly smaller than the set pressure, compressive performance of the best.
sentences.chinese: 横纹的强度极限明显小于立压，顺纹抗压性能最好。

sentences.english: The insect is small, yellow brown, the former central wings have auburn horizontal grain article 2.
sentences.chinese: 雄虫较小，淡黄褐色，前翅中部有赤褐色横纹二条。

sentences.english: Transversus linguae of lingual muscles are more developed. The gustatory glands are seen in radix linguae .
sentences.chinese: 舌肌的横纹肌发达，味腺只见于舌根部。

sentences.english: Rhabdomyosarcoma is the most common soft tissue malignancy of the head and neck in children.
sentences.chinese: 横纹肌肉瘤是儿童最常见的头颈部软组织恶性肿瘤。

sentences.english: No cases of rhabdomyolysis were reported, nor was there a risk of developing liver enzyme elevations .
sentences.chinese: 没有关于横纹肌溶解的报道，也没有肝酶升高的风险。

sentences.english: Each new state would get its own star on the flag, but not a stripe.
sentences.chinese: 每个州都能有一个星星来代表它，而并非一条横纹。

sentences.english: Rhabdomyosarcoma is the most common soft tissue sarcoma in children and adolescents.
sentences.chinese: 横纹肌肉瘤是儿童时期最常见的一种软组织肉瘤。

sentences.english: The optimum configuration was brought forward by analyzing the results of orthogonal test.
sentences.chinese: 通过分析正交试验结果，提出了较佳横纹槽管管型。

sentences.english: During flight back two black and white cross striations clearly visible.
sentences.chinese: 飞行时背部两道黑色和白色的横纹清晰可见。

sentences.english: At the junction of the dorsum of foot, between the tendons of m. extensor digitorum longus and hallucis longus.
sentences.chinese: 足背横纹中央，拇长伸肌腱与趾长伸肌腱之间。
